discussion.author: proux01
discussion.comment: Any assignee? (this should be a rather easy one)

discussion.author: affeldt-aist
discussion.comment:
I skimmed through the changelog and found no mistake.
Most CI errors seem to be nix related but not the mathcomp-analysis one...

discussion.author: proux01
discussion.comment: @affeldt-aist good catch, some lemmas indeed have slightly different implicit arguments, I warned on that in the changelog and made a (backward compatible) overlay for analysis: https://github.com/math-comp/analysis/pull/666

discussion.author: proux01
discussion.comment: Thanks @affeldt-aist so analysis is now fine and CI is "green"

tags.description: This issure/PR is about cleaning up obsolete code, removing hacks, etc

commits.author: proux01
commits.message:
Remove old compatibility code for Coq < 8.13

This code is now useless since we require Coq >= 8.13.
